cms.contentitemcommondata.BasicItemShortDescription: Sometimes our support team has to reply to your tickets with additional questions, and this causes delays. Spending a few extra minutes composing the initial issue submission can save you hours and help us guide you to a clear answer to your problem. Let's cover some easy ways you can help us, help you.
cms.contentitemcommondata.BasicItemTitle: Kentico Support: Help us help you!
cms.contentitemcommondata.ContentItemCommonDataVisualBuilderWidget:

Resources","headingAlignment":"Left","headingAlignmentsParsed":0,"headingLevel":"H3","headingLevelsParsed":2,"showHeadingAnchor":true,"id":"5b2a7685-b64e-4671-ad23-a83509cfd17b"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"headingText":"ece9cdfc-3214-4076-8ba1-0e71397f5a5e","headingAlignment":"0096a5bb-71f7-411a-9106-bb57da552bd6","headingAlignmentsParsed":"d3a09531-eb09-4340-b134-6c103b81bb9f","headingLevel":"dba5f73d-743f-422c-8c94-dd6df7992de7","headingLevelsParsed":"61b559b5-d418-4d8f-af43-84ab78e5525d","showHeadingAnchor":"cd826b92-8788-4708-b474-cd4ed6312fee","id":"c489b458-714b-49f7-8c00-53828723f27f"}}]},{"identifier":"f8902622-9f06-4ffa-a73e-8a1380953d3b","type":"CommunityPortal.MarkdownWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"d84e5592-136a-4373-845a-e366938ece1b","properties":{"markdown":"- [Question and Answer discussions](/q-and-a)
- [Blogs](/blog)
- [Resource Hub](/resource-hub)

If this still doesn’t help, let us know what you have read and tried, so we are not asking you to repeat troubleshooting steps.","markdownStyle":"Standard","markdownStyleParsed":0,"markdownCodeLanguage":"","id":"bb487733-6644-43ca-b6cb-f74bb63f5354"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"markdown":"31287bed-6964-45f2-87f1-c65d65cad335","markdownStyle":"308e97cf-76b7-4067-a261-11e54bb4d462","markdownStyleParsed":"23c5d343-d536-4b69-8978-06c35982354b","markdownCodeLanguage":"c7a6729d-1436-4e06-9b07-1a2f0ef7a163","id":"eabb4010-f179-4dab-816e-f5ff2923ad8b"}}]},{"identifier":"f4e1e2d2-d8d9-48c5-949e-c3c8d97d8911","type":"CommunityPortal.HeadingWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"a17cb26a-d020-4ecb-970d-b62b6e6f3350","properties":{"headingText":"Product Version","headingAlignment":"Left","headingAlignmentsParsed":0,"headingLevel":"H2","headingLevelsParsed":1,"showHeadingAnchor":true,"id":"073536ff-8358-4312-8968-c59504aef5f3"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"headingText":"5d6694ff-db2b-4094-b200-ae5c3eac2f72","headingAlignment":"c496c5e9-0ca1-4aca-a04f-78403b3649ae","headingAlignmentsParsed":"b3624d31-0f83-48cd-b681-a523536b4054","headingLevel":"57bf1822-9d51-4123-b211-97d4fee5cdf6","headingLevelsParsed":"86c316da-4a6c-4968-8e69-9ac235fc5d8c","showHeadingAnchor":"82588e06-7677-4e97-8e73-8fb01e1e9775","id":"c3923813-3fac-44a2-bf23-3de64c03ff61"}}]},{"identifier":"38a0fa5f-9ce6-4d17-aa1a-3444277a5c0a","type":"CommunityPortal.MarkdownWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"aa483c41-9caf-4e20-b4c5-5727837dc604","properties":{"markdown":"You'd be surprised how many people send us requests for support but forget to mention what version of our product they have a question about. Our product updates regularly! Some bugs might have already been resolve in a recent hotfix or Refresh. Others might be newly introduced and we don't know about it yet.

By telling us [what version of Xperience by Kentico](https://docs.xperience.io/tutorial/administration-interface-basics#Administrationinterfacebasics-Xperienceadministrationbasics) you are using, we can help you much faster!","markdownStyle":"Standard","markdownStyleParsed":0,"markdownCodeLanguage":"","id":"dc368814-5872-44b8-9822-3abe8eb1a3b7"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"markdown":"341ceab3-469d-4ba9-a5de-0d4f0dd37d76","markdownStyle":"338ac358-fb60-44a2-99de-1010704e7179","markdownStyleParsed":"53e33ab4-a7ec-4b4a-b3ca-1c2307dd1215","markdownCodeLanguage":"ef07fde9-b31e-4ba8-98c6-f3abc3a85f89","id":"6933bd65-0efb-4fbb-95d8-ea85bef94c5c"}}]},{"identifier":"caf20a65-e70d-4f0f-92ea-8be6415dbdd1","type":"CommunityPortal.HeadingWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"cf5cf9a6-559a-4e70-835c-98d51dcd41ec","properties":{"headingText":"Environment","headingAlignment":"Left","headingAlignmentsParsed":0,"headingLevel":"H2","headingLevelsParsed":1,"showHeadingAnchor":true,"id":"f21739a2-03d3-4422-a84c-3ab3c73e62dd"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"headingText":"c3419342-f815-4985-bb03-20b4ad775990","headingAlignment":"4074d670-7d48-4f5f-834a-b11440c0210f","headingAlignmentsParsed":"e3403b1b-0b43-4c57-b968-dce380364398","headingLevel":"5b88e67f-98a8-410c-b30f-a06186c43df0","headingLevelsParsed":"626be9c2-fbc9-4c68-80ea-5f34c55733b6","showHeadingAnchor":"e192bfc7-003f-4037-aa8b-29287a077135","id":"4d79e44f-8efe-4e93-9249-57ade571e35e"}}]},{"identifier":"35336c77-1445-4c52-be40-4e034792f796","type":"CommunityPortal.MarkdownWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"e24976a0-b7e8-427b-91dd-9492daad39ce","properties":{"markdown":"It always helps to know what tools and environment you are using! For non-developers, this would include where your Xperience by Kentico deployment is running.

- Locally (on a developer machine)
- Private cloud (you manage the VMs and infrastructure)
- Public cloud (ex: Azure, AWS, GCP)
- Xperience by Kentico SaaS And, what browser or browser extensions you have (browser extensions are notorious for causing all kinds of hard to diagnose issues).

For developers, we would like to know more technical information, include the information above.

- Operating system
- .NET SDK or runtime version
- IDE (ex: Rider, VS Code, Visual Studio)
- MS SQL Server version - Local or deployed, Docker, VM, or managed service (e.g. Azure SQL Database)
- HTTPS or HTTP
- Load balancing, WAF, CDN ","markdownStyle":"Standard","markdownStyleParsed":0,"markdownCodeLanguage":"","id":"918cbf1e-debc-4d9d-9350-8379b5fb950e"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"markdown":"5699cee2-ac11-4394-8307-a8693660bce8","markdownStyle":"c3a2e76a-e281-422b-ac37-c6f5e235bd1a","markdownStyleParsed":"fd12d73b-bf8b-4997-b7c7-4f2375ab8fae","markdownCodeLanguage":"25cc6a64-c59b-4053-a440-daae3ab75936","id":"eec58492-c1bf-4623-80da-0ab95aa0cf73"}}]},{"identifier":"45cedf06-829b-460e-85ee-f9d2e81b6b65","type":"CommunityPortal.HeadingWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"9424591a-620c-4720-8d81-6ccdeccc94b1","properties":{"headingText":"Error Messages","headingAlignment":"Left","headingAlignmentsParsed":0,"headingLevel":"H2","headingLevelsParsed":1,"showHeadingAnchor":true,"id":"745f809a-3ded-402a-ad24-01d5800f566b"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"headingText":"fd08317a-6418-4f17-9b61-62b920f734d1","headingAlignment":"ffe12d18-9dc2-4065-a2c0-2a5abf8b1a22","headingAlignmentsParsed":"68455be5-eb65-44a6-850c-3a846790e76b","headingLevel":"96b53f2d-fa4d-4196-892b-1b78928c6f01","headingLevelsParsed":"45ceeb15-f42d-4f8d-9278-bb83e3e6f6d4","showHeadingAnchor":"7521b6ee-4b69-4231-b560-1fbd67d32e26","id":"b9b4ac66-8d2d-427e-8e03-b9d6d42b73f0"}}]},{"identifier":"99d18665-ceee-45a3-95f7-8321ccdc196b","type":"CommunityPortal.MarkdownWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"6d319e4b-1ca2-4446-82c4-f5fb4a8a4644","properties":{"markdown":"Please capture any error or exception messages that you are getting and attach any Event log errors to your email. You can also attach screenshots, or send a recorded screencast.

[ScreenToGif](https://www.screentogif.com/) is a nice, easy to use tool for screen recordings.","markdownStyle":"Standard","markdownStyleParsed":0,"markdownCodeLanguage":"","id":"3bcfd392-5d6c-4953-bc2c-5f0d867e0e76"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"markdown":"21d74e58-fbcf-42c3-997c-1ffd4f1cf55c","markdownStyle":"0eec5146-8209-4b7b-891f-962c5b25b33f","markdownStyleParsed":"7ab848e1-6ed2-418a-a0d5-6f50f3eacf1c","markdownCodeLanguage":"f486cb5a-8e7b-44fc-b3a4-564025c0128d","id":"a4be4b65-966d-413a-806b-9cae3b17a272"}}]},{"identifier":"c8243de7-6eea-4d2b-8745-f4bb3dab4a4c","type":"CommunityPortal.HeadingWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"f027fd7c-2760-4e82-8734-adc71a06e2ec","properties":{"headingText":"Product Customizations","headingAlignment":"Left","headingAlignmentsParsed":0,"headingLevel":"H2","headingLevelsParsed":1,"showHeadingAnchor":true,"id":"378bb16a-01f4-47ad-bfe5-205d1ae5bb01"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"headingText":"0978dd26-51fb-4c7b-ac32-577df6624ede","headingAlignment":"808a5ec2-d731-4674-99e9-34b5ce85dc3c","headingAlignmentsParsed":"74dbf1c7-0884-4d5f-a8ba-e87d55f65057","headingLevel":"e0b3803d-3d6f-4d05-908e-4c20681c9b21","headingLevelsParsed":"398a6b57-c0c4-4d10-9435-39f7d494e703","showHeadingAnchor":"0a4dbba5-028c-4736-ad00-6e5087e8cfb0","id":"2b9e061d-0a88-49fe-af4e-17c5a195d686"}}]},{"identifier":"562f8ed5-62d1-4c66-a498-4f29214a5269","type":"CommunityPortal.MarkdownWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"8e2f21a2-963a-4c42-8a9a-5f3a9454188f","properties":{"markdown":"If you are working with customizations to Xperience by Kentico (ex: custom modules, Page Builder components, ect...) or have functionality based on the customization of features included in the product (ex: a new column in the Users List), please let us know. If possible, provide us with your code and information as to where and how you are using it.","markdownStyle":"Standard","markdownStyleParsed":0,"markdownCodeLanguage":"","id":"a7183150-9f68-456b-b867-c34e087abbc8"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"markdown":"e38dece3-0878-488a-91b4-1988938efb36","markdownStyle":"16a1aa8b-9ee1-44b3-86fe-dce5e8234e29","markdownStyleParsed":"510e6e08-dd3b-4d72-810b-8689428faab0","markdownCodeLanguage":"68c96be6-72db-44e4-b2a9-be84d4034b54","id":"e79c18dd-dfe8-4a62-bd68-498fa62fc20f"}}]},{"identifier":"aff4fcfa-916c-42ea-9cdc-71729e1beba4","type":"CommunityPortal.HeadingWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"11d6b18b-54c4-4cf3-a0f1-30aaafa95233","properties":{"headingText":"Problem and Goals","headingAlignment":"Left","headingAlignmentsParsed":0,"headingLevel":"H2","headingLevelsParsed":1,"showHeadingAnchor":true,"id":"e2eb1872-9766-4ee7-a1e8-12371e781a1e"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"headingText":"35afc941-2210-4358-9d69-0653004a8565","headingAlignment":"63620acf-c61a-4a21-9008-a1239d326792","headingAlignmentsParsed":"b1c1739e-18ca-475c-85b0-78bfd9eca71e","headingLevel":"b535fbaa-9b5f-49e5-9081-8a36a1dde5c3","headingLevelsParsed":"ac0eb553-1f3b-47a0-9bf8-3c172b845c14","showHeadingAnchor":"14a95cca-3078-41b3-a7a3-aeaecc3ecd38","id":"7eb9c649-426b-409b-87a9-c90ad7b35364"}}]},{"identifier":"0454bba9-a2b8-4007-9600-6cc60b4c7e52","type":"CommunityPortal.MarkdownWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"894730ab-249c-451b-863a-03595c4c17ff","properties":{"markdown":"Questions like “How do I achieve this?” or “I want to implement this. Can you give me the code?” with no further details are hard to answer.

We appreciate if you can include a description of expected behavior, the actual behavior, desired end-state, and a short use-case example. It’s possible that we will still need to ask you more questions, but this helps us identify which questions to ask!

We may also request a site export package or a backup of your database and project in order to reproduce and debug the issue.","markdownStyle":"Standard","markdownStyleParsed":0,"markdownCodeLanguage":"","id":"de074424-1d86-4a39-8ccf-f4b4a19357b8"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"markdown":"66335a60-b530-44fa-be1e-43f63c2260c4","markdownStyle":"c27c57cd-71be-4cf8-a11b-0262e92f96da","markdownStyleParsed":"19777acb-5e0e-4721-b909-d74615852fb3","markdownCodeLanguage":"75b32776-148a-474e-920e-f39bf16e4aea","id":"67b0c064-8cba-4313-9e1c-a77eed6659e2"}}]}]}],"fieldIdentifiers":{"layout":"6ce8997a-23ac-4e42-9ac6-f9c3dbafdc9f","layoutParsed":"a9909471-7fba-4168-9b18-499ee1b7f30d","paddingTop":"0959c346-9074-4667-bd23-ae6dffe01603","paddingTopParsed":"cbd7abdc-f4fd-43cd-9158-3ab2d40b2910","paddingBottom":"2fac1570-38c9-4d25-b10f-6e42de2de27d","paddingBottomParsed":"686b1a1c-7a06-4ed9-ba1d-bacd1be4ae56","backgroundColor":"89c8566a-bee4-4c9a-b587-fdf959d053d2","backgroundColorParsed":"c2a36e84-9c0b-4808-ae80-220c1a41a8b5"}}]}]}
cms.contentitemcommondata.WebPageMetaShortDescription: Sometimes our support team has to reply to your tickets with additional questions, and this causes delays. Spending a few extra minutes composing the initial issue submission can save you hours and help us guide you to a clear answer to your problem. Let's cover some easy ways you can help us, help you.
cms.contentitemcommondata.WebPageMetaTitle: Kentico Support: Help us help you!
